mapper.sql: SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID(`ID`) FROM wp_posts ORDER BY `ID` DESC LIMIT 0, 1;
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();
#文章id为空说明是刚开始插入新的文章 INSERT INTO `wp_posts` (`post_author`, `post_date`, `post_date_gmt`, `post_content`, `post_title`, `post_excerpt`, `post_status`, `comment_status`, `comment_count`, `ping_status`, `post_password`, `post_name`, `to_ping`, `pinged`, `post_modified`, `post_modified_gmt`, `post_content_filtered`, `post_parent`, `guid`, `menu_order`, `post_type`, `post_mime_type`) VALUES (#{postCustom.postAuthor},#{postCustom.postDate},#{postCustom.postDateGmt},#{postCustom.postContent}, #{postCustom.postTitle}, #{postCustom.postExcerpt}, #{postCustom.postStatus},#{postCustom.commentStatus},#{postCustom.commentCount},#{postCustom.pingStatus},#{postCustom.postPassword},#{postCustom.postName}, #{postCustom.toPing},#{postCustom.pinged},#{postCustom.postModified},#{postCustom.postModifiedGmt},#{postCustom.postContentFiltered}, #{postCustom.postParent},#{postCustom.guid},#{postCustom.menuOrder},#{postCustom.postType},#{postCustom.postMimeType})
mapper.select: SELECT `ID`, `post_title`, `post_date`, `post_content` FROM `wp_posts` WHERE `post_type` = 'post' AND `post_status` = 'publish' ORDER BY `ID` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT `ID`, `post_title` FROM `wp_posts` WHERE `post_type` = 'post' AND `post_status` = 'publish' ORDER BY `ID` DESC LIMIT 0, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `wp_posts` WHERE post_type = 'post' AND `post_status` = 'publish';
SELECT `post_date`, `ID` FROM `wp_posts` WHERE `post_type` = 'post' AND `post_status` = 'publish' ORDER BY `post_date` DESC

SELECT wp_posts.`ID`, wp_posts.`post_title`, wp_posts.`post_date`, LEFT(wp_posts.`post_content`, 40) 'post_content', wp_posts.`post_status`, wp_users.`display_name` 'post_author_name' FROM `wp_posts`,`wp_users` WHERE `post_type` = 'post' AND wp_posts.post_author = wp_users.ID AND (post_status!='trash' OR post_name!='__trashed') AND post_status!='inherit' ORDER BY `ID` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `wp_posts` WHERE post_type = 'post' AND (post_status!='trash' OR post_name!='__trashed') AND post_status!='inherit';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `wp_posts` WHERE post_status='trash' OR post_name='__trashed';

SELECT wp_posts.`ID`, wp_posts.`post_title`, wp_posts.`post_date`, LEFT(wp_posts.`post_content`, 40) 'post_content', wp_posts.`post_status`, wp_users.`display_name` 'post_author_name' FROM `wp_posts`,`wp_users` WHERE wp_posts.post_author = wp_users.ID AND (post_status='trash' OR post_name='__trashed') ORDER BY `ID` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};
SELECT * FROM `wp_posts` WHERE `post_parent` = #{postId} ORDER BY `ID` DESC LIMIT 0, 1;
